name: Nine Tail Blueprint
description: Though it is a fake tail, it is enchanting after putting it on.

name: Normal Precision Stone
description: If self weapon is restrained by monster size, restrained ratio reduces by 50% for 15min. Has a chance to get Expert Precision Stone in Production

name: North Kingdom Block legend
description: Late in the afternoon in a suburb of Moscow, Cenia wears a thick overcoat and is not accustomed to the cold weather. Just at the time. Colorful fireworks explode up in the air over the skyscrapers. The performance of [Seller] reminds Cenia of the interesting and simple game which helped her kill much time.

name: Northern Area Adventure Chest
description: Open the box, you will certainly receive some Colorful Shell, with a probability to receive Raccoon Leaf, Four-leaf Clover, Antenna, Fabric, Light Granule, Mercury, Amethyst, Pet EXP Potion (S), Pet EXP Potion (M), Pet EXP Potion (L), etc.

name: Nose Ring
description: The cattle's nose is pierced so that the owner can lead it conveniently. Can be purchased from the collectors.

description: The cattle's nose is pierced so that the owner can lead it conveniently. Can be purchased from the collectors.
